channel.title: MongoHub
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 2.6.1
item.description:
2.6.1

  • Avoid automatic correction from the system while editing a new document issue #121 (Thanks to Anthony Williams with pull #122)
  • Avoid automatic correction from the system while doing map/reduce
  • Be able to downgrade from 2.7 beta
